title: Pistachio Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Pistachio Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1
to 2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
scoops
vanilla ice cream
or gelato
1/2
cup
whole milk
1/4
cup
pistachio butter
(see notes)
2-3
drops
green food coloring
(optional)
1
tablespoon
chopped pistachios
Directions
Combine the ice cream, milk, pistachio butter, and food coloring (if using) in a blender and pulse on high until the mixture is smooth.
Pour into a tall, clear glass. Garnish with chopped pistachios and/or a sprig of mint.
Notes
If you cannot find pistachio butter at the grocery store, you can make your own by combining 1 cup of pistachios, 1 tablespoon of light vegetable oil, and a pinch of sea salt in a food processor and pulsing until smooth.
Non-Alcoholic Drinks
Pistachios
Ice Cream
St. Patrick's Day
